H0.text: What type of creature is a saiga. Goat

H1.text: What type of creature is a saiga. Deer

H2.text: What type of creature is a saiga. Gazelle

H3.text: What type of creature is a saiga. Antelope

A4.text: The saiga antelope (Saiga tatarica, ) or saiga is a species of antelope.

A5.text: It is the sole living member of the genus Saiga.
